summary: This mod changes the function of bears in Skyrim!  Previously they hand around you and attack if you stay too long or get too close, now they are your allies! They will not attack you and when you are being attacked they will choose to help you!
descriptionHtml:
[i]OK![/i][b] IS EVERYBODY READY FOR A LONG BRIEF DESCRIPTION?![/b]
[quote][b]"[/b]DUUUUDE! YEAH!!!!"[/quote]Well, then it's your lucky day, because this, ladies and gentlemen, is Happy Bears! Are you a bear obsessive like me? Do you like bears, just as much as I do? But then played Skyrim and thought, hey... why are bears aggressive? This is a fantasy game (so yes, I am implying that no wildlife should be aggressive, but that's irrelevant.) so bears should be your friends! Well then, if you thought all of those two lines which I just typed into my computer was accurate to you then with THIS mod, right here, the one that you're looking at right now, bears can no longer be aggressive! In fact, they will actually fight for you now! Even if they do die relatively often, considering the power of your enemies at slightly higher levels, it's nice to have a companion that in the original game would have been an enemy!

So now I'm going to list some [s]Recommended[/s] good mods that you could use with this mod that add nice additions to the game;
Actually, there's only one "good mod that adds a nice addition to the game which you can potentially use with this mod", here goes...

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2809/?tab=3&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodimages%2F%3Fuser%3D0%26id%3D2809]Panda Bears: By DigitalLion[/url] Aka: My favourite mod ever!
Now you probably notice I don't have it on in the screenshots of this mod, that's because I'm posting this mod, not that panda retexture!
